title: Trouble with new client
body: So, I have now lost 2 games in the past 2 days, because when the game is about to start I get the message that claims I have no internet connection (I do have the internet connection), and when I try to reconnect the same message starts popping up and up, and when I restart the client - here comes the best part - I can't log into my account despite typing in the correct password. It says that the client had restored to the older version for whatever reason. It's hard to express how frustrated I am, can I fix it anyhow?

replies.body:
Since you were disconnected from that game, I want to make sure we troubleshoot that first. That might have just been some kind of weird hiccup in your network or ISP, but let's take a look over some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to cover all our bases. 

As for that strange login issue, I keep seeing more of these over the weekend and it seems to be caused by some kind of weird patch issue. Try grabbing the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run a *Force Repatch* if you still can't sign back in. Let me know how that works out!
